channel.title: BUhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Stay Connected After 60
item.description: Living solo doesn’t have to mean feeling isolated. From new hobbies to joining a group, find out ways to stay socially and emotionally connected.

item.title: Ice Pick Headaches Feel Sudden and Sharp -- Here’s Why
A Simple Guide to Taking Psyllium Husk
The Sleeper Effect: How Divorce's Impact On Kids May Show Up In Adulthood
item.description: What we know about the sleeper effect of divorce.

item.title: The One Step Research Says You Should Take Following A Breakup
item.description: Social media is making breaking up harder than ever.

item.title: Why Derms Are All Obsessed With Protein Intake (And How It Can Help Aging Skin)
item.description: The topic of protein consumption has entered the beauty conversation.

item.title: Can You Live Longer By Drinking More Coffee? What A New Study Concludes
item.description: And how to brew the healthiest cup possible.

item.title: Support Your Child's Brain: A Guide To Constructive Play For Parents
item.description: Playtime, experts tell us time and again, is a vital part of growing up, learning, and brain development.
